about_the_game:
“Looking up at the stars, touching eternity - Starry Sky invites you to embark on a journey of stars”

Starry Sky is an immersive VR application that perfectly combines real starry sky data with advanced technology, taking you to explore the infinite mysteries of the universe. The application provides a dynamic starry sky synchronized with real time, allowing you to feel the natural charm of star movement at any time. Selected from the  best stargazing locations worldwide, allowing you to enjoy stunning night skies in different geographical environments without leaving your home. Experience the magnificent scenery of sunrise, sunset, and seasonal constellation changes through the Starry Sky Time Passing function. Starry Sky also showcases 88 constellation models and their captivating legends, uncovering the stories of each star for you. We have specially launched a romantic star naming function, allowing you to name a unique star for your lover and attach a unique blessing message to convey to the depths of the universe. In addition, freely chosen meditation music brings you peace and healing of mind under the starry sky. This is not only a stargazing journey, but also a profound experience that touches the soul. Join Starry Sky and share wonderful moments with the stars!

If you don't want to use a VR device to run "Starry Sky", we have also matched the running on the computer side, and the mouse and keyboard can also be operated.

Please add a social account when naming stars：
